## crossProduct() function

Calculates the cross-product (vector-product) of two vectors. This is defined only for vectors with three dimensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function crossProduct<S>(first: Vector<S>, second: Vector<S>): Vector<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  first | [Vector](./vector.vector.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; | a vector with dimension 3 |
|  second | [Vector](./vector.vector.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; | another vector with dimension 3 |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Vector](./vector.vector.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt;
